# mockagent

A Python package for mocking agents.

## Installation

```bash
pip install mockagent
```

## Usage

```python
import mockagent

# Your code here
```

## Development

### Setup

```bash
pip install -e ".[dev]"
```

### Running Tests

```bash
pytest
```

### Building

```bash
python -m build
```

### Publishing to PyPI

```bash
python -m twine upload dist/*
```
